channel.title: H3lp f3w th1ngs... n0t s0 1337
channel.description:
okay first of all...... like 400 spammers logged on at once on my server and started autotalking.... then it started randomly snowing and smoking, and i cant take it off. i have commands to set it snowy, foggy or w/e.... and i have a command that sets wether to normal. when i set it to normal, it usually effects everyone permanately, but now it only effects me, untill i logout.
secondly, after this happened, my ::banuser, ::ipbanuser, ::kick and so on, sommands dont work....
H 3 L P M 3 U 1 3 3 7 C 0 D 3 R Z ! !

item.title: H3lp f3w th1ngs... n0t s0 1337
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“chris lol, post:6, topic:224047”]whats wrong wwith you shitheads? it dosent matter what the name is. they have a diffrent ip for every playerand theres like 43000 names. how do i allow only one connection? and this other guy is using some weird ip adress and when i ip ban him he can login on another account.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 07:39:39 pm[/size][hr]and their files dont show up in connected from or in chars file[/quote]We shitheads try to help you.
There’s just been posted a tutorial on allowing 1 loging/IP. Search button.

Read full topic

item.title: H3lp f3w th1ngs... n0t s0 1337
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

yes… i know its the program. like if one of the 40-60 players it banned, it just makes another one. their names are like biosu1 bousu2 and so on, through like biosu42000… if i block the ip, the ip they login from changes.

Read full topic

item.title: H3lp f3w th1ngs... n0t s0 1337
item.dc:creator: @nozirev nozirev
item.description:
@nozirev wrote:

Actually it’s not people their ddoser programs told to do it you can’t really do anything but shut your server down for a while, or go into your program files and block illegal characters like ~!@#$%^&*()_+{}|:"<>? if they have those in their name or block their IP (It’s only one person) by doing so go to character files which comes up at the top right when you open up your source and then click any of he some names they have take the IP (copy and paste) put it in banned ips and hes dead. or get their last thing they logged in as example: verizon_dsl_local 4.64.684.5747 (I just put something random) and give a call to their ISP (Internet server provider) and tell them what the person is doing and they will take action immediately.

Read full topic
